trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge class represents a set of site links that communicate through a transport.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge 類別表示一的組透過傳輸進行通訊的站台連結。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object and name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref>類別使用指定<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref>物件和名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType> type is RPC.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType>型別是 RPC。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object that specifies the context for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref>物件，指定這個內容<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the name for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>指定這個名稱的<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref>物件。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器是忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: This exception will occur for any of the following reasons: - The context parameter does not refer to a valid forest, configuration set, domain controller, or AD LDS server.
trans-unit.target: 基於下列原因會發生此例外狀況:- context 參數並未參照到有效的樹系、 組態集、 網域控制站或 AD LDS 伺服器。

trans-unit.source: - The bridgeName parameter is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: - bridgeName 參數為空字串。

trans-unit.source: The context parameter or the bridgeName parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The context parameter or the bridgeName parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The credentials that were supplied are not valid.
trans-unit.target: 所提供的認證不是有效的。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object, name, and transport type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的執行個體<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref>類別使用指定<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref>物件、 名稱和傳輸類型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object that specifies the context for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref>物件，指定這個內容<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the name for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>指定這個名稱的<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref>物件。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType"></xref> value that specifies the transport type to be used.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType"> </xref>值，指定要使用的傳輸類型。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器是忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: This exception will occur for any of the following reasons: - The context parameter does not refer to a valid forest, configuration set, domain controller, or AD LDS server.
trans-unit.target: 基於下列原因會發生此例外狀況:- context 參數並未參照到有效的樹系、 組態集、 網域控制站或 AD LDS 伺服器。

trans-unit.source: - The bridgeName parameter is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: - bridgeName 參數為空字串。

trans-unit.source: The context parameter or the bridgeName parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The context parameter or the bridgeName parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The credentials that were supplied are not valid.
trans-unit.target: 所提供的認證不是有效的。

trans-unit.source: transport is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: transport不是有效值。

trans-unit.source: The transport type specified in the transport parameter is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的傳輸類型 transport 不支援參數。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the site link bridge.
trans-unit.target: 刪除站台連結橋接器。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器是忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"> </xref>物件尚未儲存在 Active Directory 網域服務中儲存。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources that are used by the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源釋出<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> object and, optionally, releases unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref>物件，並選擇性地釋放 unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the managed resources should be released; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if only the unmanaged resources should be released.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果應該釋放 managed 的資源。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果只釋出 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> object that matches a given directory context and name for the RPC transport protocol only.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref>物件中符合指定的目錄內容和在 RPC 傳輸通訊協定的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object that specifies the context for the search.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref>物件，指定搜尋的內容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the name of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> object to search for.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>指定名稱的<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref>来搜尋的物件</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the object was not found.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到物件。

trans-unit.source: In the context parameter that was specified, the site link bridge could not be found for the given bridgeName parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在 context 參數所指定的站台連結橋接器不找給定 bridgeName 參數。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器是忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: This exception will occur for any of the following reasons.
trans-unit.target: 基於下列原因，會發生此例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: - The target in the context parameter is not a forest, configuration set, domain controller, or an AD LDS server.
trans-unit.target: -在目標 context 參數不是樹系、 組態集、 網域控制站或 AD LDS 伺服器。

trans-unit.source: - The bridgeName parameter is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: - bridgeName 參數為空字串。

trans-unit.source: The context or the bridgeName parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The context or the bridgeName parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> object that matches a given directory context, name, and transport type.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref>物件中符合指定的目錄內容、 名稱和傳輸類型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object that specifies the context for the search.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref>物件，指定搜尋的內容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the name of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> object to search for.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>指定名稱的<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref>来搜尋的物件</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType"></xref> value that specifies the transport type of the object to search for.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType"> </xref>值，指定要搜尋之物件的傳輸類型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the object was not found.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到物件。

trans-unit.source: In the context parameter that was specified, the site link bridge could not be found for the given bridgeName parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在 context 參數所指定的站台連結橋接器不找給定 bridgeName 參數。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器是忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: This exception will occur for any of the following reasons: - The target in the context parameter is not a forest, configuration set, domain controller, or an AD LDS server.
trans-unit.target: 基於下列原因會發生此例外狀況:-中的目標 context 參數不是樹系、 組態集、 網域控制站或 AD LDS 伺服器。

trans-unit.source: - The bridgeName parameter is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: - bridgeName 參數為空字串。

trans-unit.source: The context or the bridgeName parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The context or the bridgeName parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The transport parameter is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: transport 參數不是有效值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>物件<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object that represents the directory entry for the site link bridge object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref>物件，代表站台連結橋接器物件的目錄項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"> </xref>物件尚未儲存在 Active Directory 網域服務中儲存。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得名稱<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the name of the current site link bridge object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，代表目前的站台連結橋接器物件的名稱。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: Commits all changes to the current <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> object to the underlying directory store.
trans-unit.target: 認可所有變更對目前<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref>基礎目錄存放區的物件。

trans-unit.source: The site link bridge object already exists.
trans-unit.target: 站台連結橋接器物件已經存在。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器是忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of site link objects that are associated with the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合的站台連結物件相關聯<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkCollection"></xref> object that contains <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink"></xref> objects that are associated with the current site link bridge object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkCollection"> </xref>物件，其中包含<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink"></xref>與目前的站台連結橋接器物件相關聯的物件。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 目標伺服器是忙碌或無法使用。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得名稱<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the name of the current <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>表示的目前名稱<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref>物件。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the transport type for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得的傳輸類型<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType"></xref> value that represents the transport type that is used by the current site link bridge object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType"> </xref>值，表示目前的站台連結橋接器物件使用的傳輸類型。

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 物件已處置。
